line.originaltext: 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms
4 chicken drumsticks, skin removed
4 chicken thighs, skin removed
4 celery ribs, sliced
1 cup sliced zucchini
1 cup sliced carrots
1 medium onion, sliced
1 cup tomato juice
1/2 cup chicken broth
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 teaspoon paprika
pepper to taste
3 tablespoons cornstarch
3 tablespoons cold water
Hot cooked rice
Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker.
Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker.
Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker.
Add the celery, zucchini, carrots, onion, tomato juice, broth, garlic, paprika and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing63, ing64, ing65, ing66, ing67, ing68, ing69, ing70, ing71, ing75}, ing76, "chicken mix", "add to slow cooker")

line.originaltext: Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear.
Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing76, t4, ing77, "cooked chicken", "cover and cook for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear.
Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm.
Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm.
Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm.
Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat.
Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat.
Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat.
Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices.
Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
line.annotation: cook(ing82, t5, ing83, "gravy", "stir for 2 minutes or until thickened")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.
line.annotation: combine({ing78, ing83}, ing84, "gravied chicked", "pour over chicken and vegetables")

line.originaltext: Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.
line.annotation: combine({ing74, ing84}, ing85, "for serving", "chicken and vegetables over rice")

line.originaltext: Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.
